Token.Abstract: @abstract Called prior to the presentation of a web dialog

Parameter.Name: dialog
Parameter.Abstract: A string representing the method or dialog name of the dialog being presented.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: A mutable dictionary of parameters which will be sent to the dialog.

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: The session object to use with the dialog.

Parameter.Name: dialog
Parameter.Abstract: A string representing the method or dialog name of the dialog being presented.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of parameters which were sent to the dialog.

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: The session object to use with the dialog.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The url in question, which will not be handled by the SDK if this method NO

Token.Abstract: @abstract Called when the dialog is about to be dismissed

Parameter.Name: dialog
Parameter.Abstract: A string representing the method or dialog name of the dialog being presented.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of parameters which were sent to the dialog.

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: The session object to use with the dialog.

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to a result, which may be read or changed by the handling method as needed

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to a pointer to a URL representing the URL returned by the dialog, which may be read or changed by this mehthod

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to a pointer to an error object which may be read or changed by this method as needed
